services.title: Web Development
services.shortDescription: Professional web development services using modern frameworks and best practices.
services.fullDescription: We specialize in creating high-performance, responsive websites using cutting-edge technologies like React, Astro, and Vue.js. Our development process emphasizes clean code, optimal performance, and exceptional user experiences. Every project is built with scalability, maintainability, and SEO optimization in mind.

caseStudies.title: E-commerce Platform Development
caseStudies.outcome: Built a complete e-commerce platform with React and Node.js, resulting in 150% increase in online sales and improved customer experience

caseStudies.title: Corporate Website Redesign
caseStudies.outcome: Redesigned corporate website using Astro and TailwindCSS, achieving 60% faster load times and 40% increase in lead generation

services.title: AI Integration
services.shortDescription: Integrate AI tools and automation into your existing workflows and business processes.
services.fullDescription: We help businesses leverage artificial intelligence to automate workflows, enhance productivity, and gain competitive advantages. Our AI integration services focus on practical implementations using proven tools and technologies that deliver measurable results.

caseStudies.title: Business Process Automation
caseStudies.outcome: Implemented AI-powered workflow automation reducing manual processing time by 60% and improving accuracy

services.title: Technology Consulting
services.shortDescription: Strategic technology consulting to help you make informed decisions about your digital infrastructure.
services.fullDescription: Our technology consulting services help businesses navigate the complex landscape of modern technology solutions. We provide strategic guidance on technology stack selection, digital transformation planning, and implementation roadmaps tailored to your specific needs and budget.

caseStudies.title: Technology Stack Modernization
caseStudies.outcome: Provided comprehensive technology assessment and modernization plan, resulting in 40% improved performance and reduced infrastructure costs
